main: ^Here follows an account of the heroic past of the Sultan’s line, so that which was Left can be turned into what is Right:
^The First of his line slew the Third warlord of the Marshes.
^The Second of his line conquered the Third mountain fort.
^The Second of his line then rescued the Fourth region from famine.
^The Second of his line was assassinated by the Fifth brotherhood.
^The Second of his line then ascended to the Sixth plane.
^The Second of his line had their name inscribed in the Seventh book.
^The Third of his line cured the Seventh plague.
^The Fourth of his line ruled until their Seventh year.
^The Fourth of his line had their name praised by the Sixth council.
^The Fourth of his line established the Fifth ward.
^The Fifth of his line established the Fifth dynasty.
^The Sixth of his line destroyed what the Fifth had created.
